cola-mix.name: Cola | Cola zero | Fanta | Sprite | Pepsi Max

ship-ipa-0.name: A Ship Full of IPA, 33 cl

maximo-tinto.name: Maximo Tinto, Spain
maximo-tinto.description: Medium-bodied, fairly soft wine with ripe tannins and notes of mint, liquorice, and red berries such as raspberry and strawberry.

la-primizia.name: La primizia Vino Rosso, Italy
la-primizia.description: Light, berry-forward with soft grip and refreshing acidity. Forest raspberry, strawberry compote and cherry liqueur, with pine nut, cedar, cherry stone and cinnamon on the finish.

valpolicella.name: Valpolicella Ripasso, Italy
valpolicella.description: Medium-bodied wine with flavours of dark fruit, chocolate and a touch of almond. Silky tannins and a long, slightly warm finish.

maximo-blanco.name: Maximo Blanco, Spain
maximo-blanco.description: Dry, light wine with an appetising fresh acidity and fruity flavour with hints of citrus and a touch of mineral.

mehrlein-riesling.name: Mehrlein Riesling Dry, Germany
mehrlein-riesling.description: Classic Riesling with fresh flavours of citrus, green apple, grapefruit, peach and minerals.

barefoot-white-zinfandel.name: Barefoot White Zinfandel, USA
barefoot-white-zinfandel.description: Fresh, delightful flavour of crushed strawberries, raspberries, sun-ripened pears and juicy pineapple. A very fruity wine with some sweetness and a crisp finish.

santiago-assinatura.name: Santiago Assinatura de Familia, Portugal
santiago-assinatura.description: Fresh and sweet-fruity with a slight spritz. Notes of sweet strawberries, raspberries and red currants with a pleasant sweetness and refreshing acidity. Pairs well with mildly spiced fish or chicken dishes.

veg-samosa.name: Veg Samosa, vegan
veg-samosa.description: Vegetable-filled pastry | red cabbage salad | tamarind and chilli chutney
